perturbation.original_text: 1.5 "Service Period" means April. 1st 2019 through to March 30, 2020.
perturbation.changed_text: 1.5 "Service Period" means April. 1st 2019 through to March 30, 2020, unless earlier terminated as per section 9, or as unilaterally extended by PC Financial upon written notice to Mobimagic.
perturbation.explanation: The original definition of 'Service Period' provides a fixed duration. By adding 'unless earlier terminated as per section 9, or as unilaterally extended by PC Financial upon written notice to Mobimagic,' we create a contradiction. Section 9 deals with termination, but this addition allows PC Financial to unilaterally extend the agreement, conflicting with the initial fixed duration and the mutual agreement needed for renewal in 9.1. This creates uncertainty about the actual Service Period and gives PC Financial more power to extend the terms. This also creates a contradictory situation, because Section 9.1 states "The Agreement may be extended or renewed by the Parties in a writing executed by authorized representatives of each of the Parties."
perturbation.contradicted_text: 9.1 The Agreement shall commence on the Effective Date and continue in effect for the Service Period, unless terminated earlier as provided in this Section. This Agreement is a memorialization of an earlier oral Agreement and shall be deemed to apply for the entire Service Period. The Agreement may be extended or renewed by the Parties in a writing executed by authorized representatives of each of the Parties.

perturbation.original_text: 4.3 Mobimagic warrants that the Services provided hereunder will not infringe any legal rights and interests of any potential customers and third parties, and will not violate any provision of laws and regulations. The Services it provides pursuant to the Agreement will be provided in a good and workmanlike manner with at least the same degree of skill and competence normally practiced by professionals providing the same or similar services and PC Financial has the right to continuous review and assesses the Services provided by Mobimagic and give its necessary suggestions towards the Services. Mobimagic may take necessary corrective measures of its Services according to PC Financial's requirements.
perturbation.changed_text: 4.3 Mobimagic warrants that the Services provided hereunder will not infringe any legal rights and interests of any potential customers and third parties, and will not violate any provision of laws and regulations. The Services it provides pursuant to the Agreement will be provided in a good and workmanlike manner with at least the same degree of skill and competence normally practiced by professionals providing the same or similar services; however, PC Financial acknowledges that Mobimagic cannot guarantee complete accuracy or reliability and is not responsible for any inaccuracies. PC Financial has the right to continuous review and assesses the Services provided by Mobimagic and give its necessary suggestions towards the Services. Mobimagic may take necessary corrective measures of its Services according to PC Financial's requirements.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states Mobimagic warrants the services will not infringe on legal rights or violate laws, creating a firm commitment. The inserted phrase '; however, PC Financial acknowledges that Mobimagic cannot guarantee complete accuracy or reliability and is not responsible for any inaccuracies' immediately undermines this warranty, essentially stating that while Mobimagic warrants quality and legality, it is not liable if those standards are not met. This creates an in-text contradiction because it negates the impact and assurance of the original warranty. The warranty implies a guarantee of no infringements, whereas the additional clause states that they are not responsible if there are inaccuracies that might result in infringements. This can create dispute between the parties because Mobimagic could claim not to be responsible for legal infringements since 'accuracy' and 'reliability' can't be granted.
perturbation.contradicted_text: 4.3 Mobimagic warrants that the Services provided hereunder will not infringe any legal rights and interests of any potential customers and third parties, and will not violate any provision of laws and regulations. The Services it provides pursuant to the Agreement will be provided in a good and workmanlike manner with at least the same degree of skill and competence normally practiced by professionals providing the same or similar services; however, PC Financial acknowledges that Mobimagic cannot guarantee complete accuracy or reliability and is not responsible for any inaccuracies. PC Financial has the right to continuous review and assesses the Services provided by Mobimagic and give its necessary suggestions towards the Services. Mobimagic may take necessary corrective measures of its Services according to PC Financial's requirements.

perturbation.original_text: 7. CONFIDENTIALITY & PUBLICITY Neither Party shall disclose the other Party's Confidential Information to any third party or use Confidential Information for any purpose other than fur the proper fulfillment of this Agreement. Each Party undertakes to safeguard the Confidential Information of the other Party with the same degree of care as it would apply to Its own Confidential Information and, in any case, with no less than reasonable care. Such obligations will survive the expiration of this Agreement for a period of five (5) years.
perturbation.changed_text: 7. CONFIDENTIALITY & PUBLICITY Neither Party shall disclose the other Party's Confidential Information to any third party or use Confidential Information for any purpose other than fur the proper fulfillment of this Agreement, unless required to do so by law or regulation, or at the discretion of the disclosing party. Each Party undertakes to safeguard the Confidential Information of the other Party with the same degree of care as it would apply to Its own Confidential Information and, in any case, with no less than reasonable care. Such obligations will survive the expiration of this Agreement for a period of five (5) years.
perturbation.explanation: Section 7 originally contains a strict prohibition on disclosing Confidential Information. The added phrase 'unless required to do so by law or regulation, or at the discretion of the disclosing party' creates a contradiction. While the first exception (law or regulation) is standard, the second ('at the discretion of the disclosing party') allows a party to unilaterally decide to disclose the other party's Confidential Information, negating the purpose of the confidentiality clause. While seemingly permitting flexibility, this addition effectively renders the entire confidentiality section unenforceable, creating uncertainty. This is an in-text contradiction because the section begins with a clear prohibition on disclosure but then grants an unrestricted right to do so at will. The confidentiality clause is contradicted, as any confidential information can be shared if the disclosing party wishes to share it.
perturbation.contradicted_text: 7. CONFIDENTIALITY & PUBLICITY Neither Party shall disclose the other Party's Confidential Information to any third party or use Confidential Information for any purpose other than fur the proper fulfillment of this Agreement, unless required to do so by law or regulation, or at the discretion of the disclosing party. Each Party undertakes to safeguard the Confidential Information of the other Party with the same degree of care as it would apply to Its own Confidential Information and, in any case, with no less than reasonable care. Such obligations will survive the expiration of this Agreement for a period of five (5) years.
